text: The foods are nice however the service sucks! And foods charging can be different even though you order the same amount and ingredients from your last visit. Lastly a piece of advice, you have to chase them if you waited too long, as I was in the queue first and waited patiently for my foods and I ended the last one to receive my foods. Always order Chicken pot

This time I add other veggies I spent $35 but small portion. Worst they remove other peppers and veggies which originally in the the expensive chicken menu. Cheater and scammer. Not only short change customer the taste of the chicken pot $35 totally different. Chicken is uncooked and all bone today. Totally no ethics. In the end I throw away. Less oil also become more oil. If you want to waste money to ruin your day go ahead and order.

This is not the first time they do this scam No more order from here.

If I can give zero star I will.

Decided to add on rice after we have gotten our food, paid $0.70 via pay wave cashier lady told us that we need to pay $0.10 more for takeaway but paywave min amount is $0.50 so asked us to pay $0.50 more â€¦ paid $1.20 for the rice in the end hahaha

Taste wise meh â€¦. And portion looks lesser than we had taken â€¦

Price is incredibly increasing!
I used to take food below $12 included 2 rice. Recently, same portion of food became $14-16 since 3months ago! On last week, I ordered the same with 2rice, she only gave 1 rice when I collecting. So I declared and ask her to check the receipt on machine and TOLD ME MINE WAS WITHOUT RICE SO I NEED TO ADD ON FOR RICE. I ask her to show me the receipt she looked at just now, she look again and SAID IT WAS NOT MY RECEIPT. This really doesn't make any sense!! Also, mala at other place will show u when they weight, but this never! I wonder how much COMMISSION the woman self collect each month? Its really not trust worthy store.
